objects.text: X-Trans CMOS II Sensor • Classic Design • WiFi Connectivity • Full HD Video

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system compatibility
• Precision-engineered manual control dials for intuitive operation
• High-performance autofocus system for quick and accurate focusing
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for precise composition
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip
• WiFi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens collection
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Advanced shooting modes and creative filters

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, sleek promotional layout for a digital camera, centered on a dark gradient background with subtle noise and fine geometric circles for depth. The headline (id: "heading") is prominently displayed in bold white, drawing attention at the top. Just below it, the subheadline (id: "subheading") adds a soft, elegant line in light gray, complementing the headline. At the center, a high-quality product image (id: "product_image") is featured, making it the focal point of the design. Beneath the image, product features are listed in small uppercase text (id: "description"). A bold, eye-catching price (id: "price") in yellow is shown above a strong call-to-action button, with a white background and black text (ids: "cta_background" and "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Background gradient: #1a1a1a to #333333
- Headline Text: #FFFFFF
- Subheadline Text: #E6E6E6
- Feature Description Text: #CCCCCC
- Price Text: #FFB800 (yellow)
- CTA Button Background: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text: #000000
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera showcases a sleek, professional design dominated by matte and glossy blacks. The color palette is mostly monochromatic with subtle highlights. Key tones include deep black (#0D0D0D) for the body, graphite gray (#2E2E2E) on the textured grip, and metallic silver (#BFBFBF) on the dials and lens rings. Accents like the red "5.6" marking (#C0392B) and orange "XF" logo (#E67E22) add visual interest without disrupting the elegance. The lens coating reflects faint greenish-yellow (#A3C46D), subtly enhancing depth. This balanced combination of neutrals and highlights makes a strong foundation for a sophisticated advertisement banner.
